name: Tales of Pixel
description:
---------------------------------------------

Tales of pixel Beta:

You play as Prauto.

Prauto is a young boy who wants revenge on his creator.

Why? It's simple, his Creator destined him to lose again and again.

Will Prauto be able to avenge his family?

In any case, a great adventure awaits him.

During his trip, he will be able to make lots of friends ...

He will also discover the true meaning of his life.

Because the game cannot stop ...

---------------------------------------------
